meanings.definition: A device used to automatically trigger a camera at set intervals for time-lapse photography.
meanings.sent1: The intervalometers captured the blooming flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often rely on intervalometers for creating stunning time-lapse videos.
meanings.sent3: The intervalometers decided to take a break and triggered the camera to capture a squirrel dance party.
meanings.sent4: The intervalometers worked tirelessly, like tiny clockwork elves, ensuring every moment was frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: With the intervalometers ticking away, the sunrise was beautifully documented in the final video.
